chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Ask me anything about this case
chatbot.greeting: Hello! I'm your AI medical assistant. I can help you better understand this case. Feel free to ask me anything!

feedback.requireAnnotation: Requirement: Use drawing tools to accurately locate abnormal areas on the X-ray before submitting.
feedback.correctDiagnosisWrongLocation: Assessment: Correct diagnosis but wrong lesion localization
feedback.feedbackNote: You have identified the disease correctly but have not accurately located the lesion on the film.
feedback.upperMiddleLobe: usually in the upper or middle lobe of the lung
feedback.characteristicsTip: Characteristics: Increased density area, darker than normal lung background
feedback.boundaryTip: Boundary: Irregular, may be diffuse or localized
feedback.dragImageGuide: Drag the image below to the display frame to learn accurate localization:
feedback.needsImprovement: Assessment: Correct diagnosis but needs improvement in localization
feedback.improvementNote: You have identified the disease and part of the lesion location correctly. Need to improve accuracy in region marking.
feedback.adjustRegion: Expand or shrink the region for accuracy
feedback.correctLocationWrongDiagnosis: Assessment: Accurate localization but wrong diagnosis
feedback.wrongDiagnosisNote: You have accurately located the lesion but made an incorrect judgment about the disease.
feedback.reviewRequest: Require review of medical history, clinical symptoms and imaging features to make accurate diagnosis.
feedback.upperMidLung: Upper or middle lobe of lung
feedback.compareBelow: Drag the image below to the display frame to compare:
feedback.outsideLungArea: The area you marked is outside the lung area.
feedback.focusOnCenterChest: Focus on the central chest area
feedback.wrongMainLesion: Main lesion location not correctly identified.
feedback.noticeOpacityUpperLobe: Notice opacities in the upper lobe of lungs
feedback.observeDifference: Observe differences between left and right lungs
feedback.upperOrMiddleLobe: Usually in upper or middle lobe

clinicalSignificance.pulmonaryConsolidation: This lesion suggests inflammation or tuberculosis. Need to combine sputum tests and prolonged cough history.
clinicalSignificance.fibrosis: Pulmonary fibrosis is a sign of chronic damage, commonly seen in treated old tuberculosis.
clinicalSignificance.cardiomegaly: Increased heart size may be due to heart failure or prolonged pulmonary hypertension.
clinicalSignificance.default: This lesion needs further evaluation with additional tests.

chatbotResponses.locationQuestion:
üìç **Lesion Location:**

In this case, the main lesions are located at:
‚Ä¢ **Right upper lung lobe** - Clear opacity
‚Ä¢ **Perihilar region** - Mild fibrosis

You can try marking the areas you think are abnormal, I will assess their accuracy! üéØ
chatbotResponses.aiAnalysisQuestion:
ü§ñ **AI Analysis:**

AI has detected abnormal areas with high confidence. Would you like to see the heatmap to compare with the areas you marked?

The heatmap will display:
üî¥ Red areas: High abnormality
üü° Yellow areas: Suspicious
üü¢ Green areas: Normal
chatbotResponses.recognitionGuide:
üîç **How to recognize lesions:**

1. **Observe density:** Diseased areas are usually brighter (increased density)
2. **Compare both sides:** Find differences between left and right lungs
3. **Boundaries:** Lesions usually have unclear boundaries
4. **Location:** Tuberculosis commonly occurs in upper lobes

Try marking regions, I will give feedback immediately! üí™
chatbotResponses.diagnosisInfo:
üè• **Diagnosis:**

{diagnosis} - AI Confidence: 87%

**Diagnostic basis:**
‚Ä¢ Opacity in upper lung lobe
‚Ä¢ Signs of fibrosis
‚Ä¢ Irregular boundaries

**Additional tests needed:**
‚Ä¢ Sputum smear for AFB
‚Ä¢ GeneXpert test
‚Ä¢ CT scan if necessary
chatbotResponses.treatmentInfo:
üíä **Treatment Regimen:**

**Intensive phase (2 months):**
‚Ä¢ Rifampicin + Isoniazid + Pyrazinamide + Ethambutol

**Continuation phase (4 months):**
‚Ä¢ Rifampicin + Isoniazid

‚ö†Ô∏è **Notes:**
‚Ä¢ Take medication regularly
‚Ä¢ Do not stop medication on your own
‚Ä¢ Regular follow-up
chatbotResponses.defaultResponse:
That's a good question! You can:

üìù Try marking lesions on the image
ü§ñ Ask me about 'heatmap' to see AI analysis
üìç Ask about lesion 'location'
üîç Ask 'how to recognize' the disease

I will evaluate and give you feedback immediately! üí™
